Book a Demo

**Oct. 19, 2023:** J.P. Morgan Payments partners with Trulioo to power
business and person verification worldwide and help clients combat fraud and
other financial crimes. Read the press release.

# The World’s Identity Platform

Know who you’re doing business with anywhere in the world.

Talk to our experts

Discover our platform

##  Verify the World  Optimize Identity Verification for Growth, Innovation,
Trust

Identity verification poses complex challenges around the world. Our
sophisticated solutions identify more customers with certainty through an
integrated end-to-end platform. Build onboarding workflows with ease, fuel
global expansion and confidently meet evolving global regulations.

###  Drive Growth  Expand Your Global Reach

Embrace new markets with nimble identity and business verification. Open the
door to more than 5 billion consumers in 195 countries. Different countries
present different identification challenges. One platform unlocks your access
to more than 450 data sources worldwide to turn your global ambition into
reality.

Expand to new markets

###  Power Innovation  Harness Advanced Technology

Tap into API directly or a no-code, drag-and-drop system that features
customizable workflows, AI-driven insights and real-time analytics. Quickly
integrate with plug-and-play personalized solutions.

Trulioo Identity Platform

###  Build Trust  Minimize Risk, Maximize Confidence

Ensure the right balance between identity verification and user experience to
create trusted, sustainable relationships with your customers. Leverage risk
mitigation, fraud prevention, and trust and safety programs to stop bad actors
before they can do damage.

Find your risk balance

195  countries covered  5+  billion potential customers  700M  verifiable
business entities  450+  global data sources

##  Identity Verification Knows No Border

With more than 450 data sources and coverage of 13,000-plus document types
from around the world, we help you navigate the unique verification challenges
of any country. Browse document types available for verification.

Our Experts Are Ready to Help You Grow

Book a demo

## Sophisticated Solutions That Minimize Risk

Person Match

Trulioo accurately verifies digital identity around the world with industry-
leading regional match rates, data and local results. Easily expand across
borders and onboard more users.

Learn more about Person Match

Identity Document Verification

Capture, analyze and authenticate more than 11,800 identity documents
worldwide. Reduce abandonment with real-time ID document verification that
enhances the customer experience.

Learn more about Identity Document Verification

Business Verification

Build a 360-degree view of business customers, from confirming registration
numbers to identifying ultimate beneficial ownership. The Business
Verification suite of tools enables authentication of more than 300 million
businesses worldwide.

Learn more about Business Verification

Global Watchlist Screening

Screen customers against more than 6,000 global watchlists and 20,000 adverse
media sources to achieve AML, sanction screening and KYC compliance. Reduce
false positives and minimize manual reviews to meet customer expectations and
protect your business.

Learn more about Global Watchlist Screening

Utility Data

Accelerate proof of address compliance with access to more than 2,200 utility
partners worldwide. Confirm names and addresses through bills and records for
fast, accurate, low-friction verification.

Learn more about Utility Data

### Any Industry, Anywhere

Achieve compliance, reduce fraud and build customer trust across all
industries around the world.

Banking

Keep pace and remain compliant with evolving KYC and AML regulations.

Learn More

Cryptocurrency

Meet customer expectations for fast, secure onboarding in a rapidly changing
industry.

Learn More

Foreign Exchange

Achieve KYC compliance that transcends borders and helps you defend against
fraud and identity theft.

Learn More

Marketplaces

Create a trusted ecosystem with verified vendors and customers to gain a
competitive advantage.

Learn More

Online Trading

Provide a fast, smooth customer experience while meeting extensive compliance
obligations worldwide.

Learn More

Payment Service Providers

Deliver comprehensive identity verification that protects your payments
business and customers.

Learn More

Wealth Management

Onboard global clients securely while balancing verification and user
expectations for speed and convenience.

Learn More

By clicking “Accept All Cookies”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your
device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our
marketing efforts. Cookie Policy

Cookies Settings Reject All Accept All Cookies

## Privacy Preference Center

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your
browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you,
your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as
you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but
it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your
right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on
the different category headings to find out more and change our default
settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience
of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
Learn more about how we use cookies

Allow All

###  Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched
off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by
you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy
preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block
or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then
work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure
and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are
the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All
information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If
you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our
site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and
personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose
services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then
some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They
may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show
you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal
information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet
device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted
advertising.

#### Social Media Cookies

Social Media Cookies

These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added
to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks.
They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a
profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on
other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be
able to use or see these sharing tools.
